entry:
Look for a gap in their blockchain to escape with Level 1.
Close 2LK > test with block > if they reactively block, try MP or overhead?
Near corner, use h.bomb finisher; try EX Crusher to trigger bomb for max damage, then follow with overhead and L.Crusher on landing.
Close double 2LK > LP > confirm into L.Crusher or L.DK.
Drill: 2MK CDR > 3 options: immediate throw / LP (shimmy) / MP (frame trap).
if Spike > hold parry then rush in with HP for faster reach and +frame or far try m.dk
Can I play Bison with crusher as main ender for better Oki and corner carry?
Gladius is the start point of neutral
Shimmy practice, as much as possible

Didnâ€™t perform well, need to enjoy the flow more. Leaning toward an easy way out. But at least, I did some good combo and gained good experience. Need to attend more competitions to get used to being in the spotlight.
Counter MK > distance timed HP/sweep/l.dk
Counter 2HP -14f >sweep/ l.dk
ex.bomb combo ender prevent rollback!
Lvl 1 to counter any 2MK > Cdr.lp combo if there is any gap in between
If they catching your HP by counter hit, delay HP with max range or MK > l.dk to push out
MK2 > cdr.2LP > mixup into my game plan
Improve corner pressure > HP > 2MP > mixup
Bait HP/2MK - Back dash> 2MK buffer
With bar - counter dk > follow with > 2lp >lp > ex.bomb
Cornered 2LP -1 + pushed out of my light ranges
Use 2MP CDR into HK 2HK combo.
Anti ball with parry buffer drive rush
more 2MK at corner
Fine tune instant l.dk to avoid misinput into level 1
Practice basic over head l.bomb fix the timing
Practice post dk. Frame trap timing (-1f gap)rf
Space trap dr.2LK > 2LP > LP > space trap 2MP
Block chain dr.2LK > 2LP > LP > 2MK/MK > l.dk
Jump in shimmy (with no attack) micro walk then MP > 2MP
2MK > -3 > can punish on reaction with 2MP/ 2MK on far
Counter is a -6 continue 2MP buffer
HIGH RISK On Bomb double HP > 1st HP to control range > 2nd HP to gap close for > 2MP > m.Bomb (once bomb on block triggered then block chain frame trap rotations)
Block chain Safe > 4HK >  2LK > 2LP
Block chain 4HK > 6HK >
Block chain  4HK > 2MP
Cornered > DR 2LK > 2LP > 2LP > Option select
Under cornered Juri MP to space trap due to hurt boss is behind her feet as soon as i HP my hurt box will be reached by her hit box. But she with whiff MP watch for that for whiff punish or jump out.
Look for safe reversal to buffer under corner pressure
Do meaty to target bar dmg
Use more good buttons to frame trap opponents but not to whiff
Tech too early, I got conditioned for shimmy
Anti 2MK > b dash
Need better combo option > always go for kill
When 2LP always buffer with 2MP just in case of counter hit for better escape and potential
Practice dr > l.dk on round start
Anti-air > 2HP > level 2
Learn CDR shimmy
bomb light confirm into ex.backfist > h.backfist
